content: Hey everyone, unfortunately I became quite sick over night. I hope this will effect none of you but maybe those who spend time with or in vicinity to me yesterday evening should be aware. I will try to get back to Hamburg later today. It was great fun with all of you and I learnt a lot. Thank you so much!
Sorry to hear! Thank you so much for coming. I hope you get back well and recover quickly!
Thanks for letting us know and get well soon!
Sorry to read! I hope you will get better soon.
